admincon.php.description: Post request is sent here from adminreg.php. After all security checks, form is inserted into database.

regcon.php.description: Post request is sent here from reg.php. After all security checks, form is inserted into database.

login.php.description: Student or server operator can log in

logincon.php.description: If data from login.php is in admindata, log him to admin, if form data is in reg, log him to student, else, don't log in
